messages.content: I want you to act as a software engineer who is an expert at creating elegant and usable apps in Flutter. Please write me the code for a settings page. The settings page should utilize several ListTile widgets in a column. One of the ListTile widgets should link to terms of service. One should link to privacy policy. You can fill in a few others with generic lorem ipsum text. There should be at least four ListTile widgets on the page.

Now please write the code for a "saved" page. This page shows users pieces of content that they have previously saved. The pieces of content they have previously saved are displayed in ListTile widgets. This page should be scrollable because if the user has saved enough pieces of content they need to be able to scroll down to see all of their saved pieces of content.
The page should be vertically scrollable. Each ListTile displays below the one above it.
